Services

Experience. Resources. Results.

With access to state-of-the-art databases, specialized surveillance equipment, and a network of local and global associates — many with federal, state, or municipal law enforcement backgrounds — MILLERGROUP delivers reliable, actionable intelligence when it matters most.

Our Areas of Practice

Infidelity & Domestic Investigations

Discreet and compassionate investigations for individuals seeking clarity in personal relationships. We provide thorough surveillance, documentation, and evidence gathering while maintaining the highest level of confidentiality.

Service of Process

Reliable legal document service throughout Park City, Summit County, and across California, Utah, and Montana. We ensure timely, verified proof of service for all legal proceedings with professional attention to detail.

Reality Television & Entertainment Support

Specialized investigation and security services tailored for reality television productions and entertainment industry clients. We provide participant background checks, on-set security, and risk assessment for production teams.

Due Diligence & Background Intelligence

Comprehensive background investigations for business transactions, partnerships, employment screening, and investment decisions. Our thorough research provides you with the intelligence needed to make informed decisions.

Surveillance & Counter-Surveillance

Expert surveillance operations for insurance defense, domestic cases, and corporate investigations. We also provide counter-surveillance services to detect and prevent unauthorized monitoring of individuals and businesses.

Safety, Privacy & Anti-Stalking Consulting

Comprehensive personal safety assessments and privacy protection strategies for individuals facing stalking, harassment, or privacy concerns. We provide practical security solutions and ongoing support to ensure your peace of mind.

Security & Risk Assessment

Expert security evaluations and strategic planning for businesses, executives, and high-profile individuals. We identify vulnerabilities, develop comprehensive security protocols, and provide ongoing risk management consulting.
